name: dodging-bullets
description: A mobile-first approach to hanging bullets and ordinals for ordered and unordered lists.
author: Kenneth Ormandy <hello@kennethormandy.com> (http://kennethormandy.com)

scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specifiedâ€¦yet! Pull requests on kennethormandy/dodging-bullets are greatly appreciated." && exit 1
scripts.examples: npm run styleguide && harp server examples
scripts.compile: npm run styleguide && harp compile examples ./www
scripts.deploy: npm run compile && surge www dodging-bullets.kennethormandy.com
